description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget for a filter screen allowing users to select filtering criteria such as hair color, race, religion, height, and weight. It manages state locally and interacts with a FilterProvider for state management, providing UI components like checkboxes and sliders.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget that provides filtering UI for selecting multiple criteria such as hair color, race, religion, and numeric ranges for height and weight.

classes.name: _FilterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing the internal state (local height and weight ranges) and building the UI for FilterScreen.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes local height and weight ranges from the filter criteria received from the provider.

methods.name: _sectionTitle
methods.description: Builds a styled section title widget for different filter sections.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the filter screen, including checkboxes, sliders, and action buttons.
